articles.title: Having raw almonds before meals can help reduce glucose spike: A discussion with Dr Anoop Mishra and Dr Seema Gulati - Times of India
articles.description: Having 20 grams of almonds 30 min before meals can help drop glucose spike in Asian Indians, a new research study has found. Watch this video to know more about this from Dr Anoop Misra, Chairman, Fortis CDOC Hospital for Diabetes and Allied Sciences and Dr S…
articles.content:
